channel.title: Usethis on Data science in genetics & related things
channel.description: Recent content in Usethis on Data science in genetics & related things

item.title: Uses this
item.description: Since I was a child I have been interested (if not obsessed) in how people manage their lifes. So recently, when I stumbled accross usesthis it felt like the answer to my main question: what things (tools/apps/hardware) do people use in order to maximise the time for the fun part of work/life. One of the first usethis entries that I read was the one from Yihui Xie, recorded in 2012.
